results.definition: meeting adequate standards for a purpose
examples: it is fit and proper that you be there
do as you see fit to

results.definition: (usually followed by `to' or `for') on the point of or strongly disposed
examples: in no fit state to continue
we are set to go at any time

results.definition: physically and mentally sound or healthy
examples: felt relaxed and fit after their holiday
keeps fit with diet and exercise
